description: A summary description of the custom plugin.

parameters.name: customPluginArn
parameters.description: Returns information about a custom plugin.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the custom plugin was created.

nested_items.name: customPluginArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: customPluginState
nested_items.description: The state of the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: latestRevision
nested_items.description: The latest successfully created revision of the custom plugin. If there are no successfully created revisions, this field will be absent.

nested_items.name: contentType
nested_items.description: The format of the plugin file.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The time that the custom plugin was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: fileDescription
nested_items.description: Details about the custom plugin file.

nested_items.name: fileMd5
nested_items.description: The hex-encoded MD5 checksum of the custom plugin file. You can use it to validate the file.

nested_items.name: fileSize
nested_items.description: The size in bytes of the custom plugin file. You can use it to validate the file.

nested_items.name: s3Location
nested_items.description: The S3 bucket Amazon Resource Name (ARN), file key, and object version of the plugin file stored in Amazon S3.

nested_items.name: bucketArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: fileKey
nested_items.description: The file key for an object in an S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: objectVersion
nested_items.description: The version of an object in an S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the custom plugin.

nested_items.name: stateDescription
nested_items.description: Details about the state of a custom plugin.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: A code that describes the state of a resource.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A message that describes the state of a resource.
